CustomField.formula: IF( Orders_customer__c = true, 0, If(Orders_last_year_rolling__c = 0, 0, Orders_last_year_rolling__c * IF(Account__r.Average_Shopping_Basket__c = 0, Median_Basket_converted__c, IF((Account__r.zz_Transaction_volume_protections_p__c / Account__r.Average_Shopping_Basket__c / Orders_last_year_rolling__c) > 0.25, Account__r.Average_Shopping_Basket__c, Median_Basket_converted__c))))
CustomField.label: Calculated Turnover
